title: Nawazuddin Siddiqui Motichoor Chaknachoor:Motichoor Chaknachoor Trailer: Nawazuddin's Desperate Search For A Bride Gets A Thumbs Up From Fans
text:
The trailer of Motichoor Chaknachoor opens with Nawazuddin Siddiqui saying, "36 ke ho gaye hain... kab tak Bhramachari banke baithe rahenge?"

This movie looks like a hilarious dig at our country's obsession with the idea of getting married.

YouTube

The film narrates the story of two bachelors struggling to find their perfect better halves. Nawazuddin essays the role of a 36-year-old Dubai returned NRI, Pushpinder Tyagi, who after a lot of struggles marries a girl named Annie, played by Athiya Shetty.

Annie's only aspiration in life is to settle in abroad by hook or crook. Therefore, she, in the end, ties the knot with Pushpinder Tyagi in hopes of making a living in Dubai. But things take a hilarious turn and nothing turns out as expected.

Don't Miss 43.8 K SHARES 23.6 K SHARES 16.8 K SHARES 4.6 K SHARES 7.7 K SHARES

Going by the trailer, it looks the film is going to be a laugh riot. Check out the trailer below:

The film looks like a delicious four-course meal with the right dose of everything from heartbreak to fights, competition, and stress.

Fans have given a big thumbs up to the trailer. One fan asked Nawaz, "Har baar naya style kahan se late ho..." and it pretty much sums up our feelings too.

Although the entire film has already been summed up in the trailer.. the content and acting is applaudable.. @theathiyashetty played her part really well.. and Nawazuddin as always is natural.. 👏🏻👍#MotichoorChaknachoor — Sneha (@beingsnehaa) October 11, 2019

#MotiChoorChaknachoor Hilarious and interesting comedy by you @Nawazuddin_S brother. Mood on. @theathiyashetty She seen her performance.🤘🤘🤘🤘🤘🤘🤘 — Asheesh Kumar (John Cena) (@Asheesh91727223) October 11, 2019

Never thought would say this but Athiya Shetty is good in this trailer.....#MotichoorChaknachoor — Mithila (@mithsgad) October 11, 2019

BHAYANAK trailer of #MotichoorChaknachoor . Really loved it. And @theathiyashetty is revelation and Superb. WOW!! Take my Money again 😀😀😀 https://t.co/5iv5QdjrIU — Nagraj Returns (@CrookBond_D) October 11, 2019

Wow Superbbbbbb Trailer👌❤ So exited for#MotiChoorChaknachoor — Dalpaт Razzpυroнιт (@dalpatSunielian) October 11, 2019

भाई हर बार नया स्टाइल कहा से लाते हो — Ashish (@ShilwantAshish) October 11, 2019

Ama nawaz bhai kahar maza diyo tum toh — HT Tripathi (@TripathiJiii) October 11, 2019

bhai aap ki movie ka intjar rehta hai — Shahjad Khan (@Shahjad64739250) October 11, 2019

Other than Athiya and Siddiqui, the film also stars Vibha Chibber, Navni Parihar, Vivek Mishra, Karuna Pandey, Sanjeev Vats, Abhishek Rawat, Sapna Sand and Usha Nagar. The movie's been directed by Debamitra Biswal and produced by Rajesh Bhatia and Kiran Bhatia. It will hit the theatres on November 15, this year.

So, are you willing to eat this motichoor ladoo? Tell us in comments below.

(With agency inputs)
description: In a country obsessed the concept of weddings, this movie looks like a hilarious dig at people's obsession with the idea of getting married. The film narrates the story of two bachelors struggling to find their perfect better halves. Nawazuddin essays the role of a 36-year-old Dubai returns NRI, Pushpinder Tyagi, who after a lot of struggles marries a girl named Annie, played by Athiya Shetty.
